entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kuujjuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -32.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuaq Airport 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -32.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -38.9°C
Wind: W 24 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
